title.rendered: SUGARED + BRONZED Announces Exciting New Store Opening in Newport Beach, CA

content.rendered:
SUGARED + BRONZED spray tanning and sugaring lobby

Co-Founder, Courtney Claghorn, of SUGARED + BRONZED

The innovative beauty brand expands its reach with a new, state-of-the-art location at 924 Avocado Ave in Newport Beach, California.

NEWPORT BEACH, CALIFORNIA, USA, October 24, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — SUGARED + BRONZED, the nation’s forefront beauty brand specializing in sugaring and sunless tanning, is thrilled to announce the grand opening of its newest location in the heart of Newport Beach, California. Located at 924 Avocado Ave, the latest SUGARED + BRONZED addition just opened its doors in the Corona Del Mar shopping center in Newport, offering its renowned, top-tier services to a vibrant, sun-loving community.

We are excited to elevate SUGARED + BRONZED’s presence in Newport Beach, says Sam Offit, Co-Founder and CEO of SUGARED + BRONZED.

This new location not only allows us to cater to the beautiful community of Newport but also aligns perfectly with our mission to provide accessible, top-of-the-line sugaring and bronzing services in a welcoming, chic environment.

The new Newport Beach location is designed to encapsulate what customers have come to love about SUGARED + BRONZED: a sleek, modern aesthetic, unparalleled customer service, and the highest standards of cleanliness. The store will offer the brand’s signature services, including sugaring for hair removal and customized airbrush tanning.

Since its inception, SUGARED + BRONZED has revolutionized the beauty industry, focusing on natural ingredients, skin health, and radiant results. The brand’s commitment to skin-loving formulas makes it a perfect fit for Newport Beach residents’ health-conscious, sun-soaked lifestyle.

Appointments for the Newport Beach location are now available for booking through the SUGARED + BRONZED website or the brand’s user-friendly mobile app. Walk-ins are also welcome based on availability.

About SUGARED + BRONZED

SUGARED + BRONZED was founded in 2011 with the mission to provide high-quality sugaring and tanning services in a luxurious and friendly atmosphere. Known for sugaring technique and premier bronzing services, SUGARED + BRONZED commits to making clients feel their best, shining from the inside out. For more information, visit sugaredandbronzed.com or follow us on Instagram @sugaredandbronzed. Coming soon to Houston, Miami, and Brooklyn.

For further information or to arrange interviews, please contact:

Molly Barela

Molly Barela
SUGARED + BRONZED
email us here

News Provided By
